metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19840 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The function WavpackPackInit in pack_utils.c in libwavpack.a in WavPackthrough 5.1.0 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (resourceexhaustion caused by an infinite loop) via a crafted wav audio file becauseWavpackSetConfiguration64 mishandles a sample rate of zero.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19840` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwavpack1 - 4.75.2-2ubuntu0.2
wavpack - 4.75.2-2ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: wavpack package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.75.2-2ubuntu0.2').
